value.timelineDescription: I contacted Mary Richards to discuss building works on our roof.
We agreed what work should be done and signed contract.
The work started on the roof.
The work on the roof was completed but I noticed that there was a problem with one section.

evidenceItem.description: I have a signed contract showing that you broke the contract agreement.
The photos I've taken show the poor workmanship of the roof repair.
